entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
